sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Mobile Offline - Add the new queue: "mobile_offline_payload_gen_queue" to the "event.limited.queue" to be able to make use of the new Event Management System for generating Mobile Offline Payloads</description> <name>Mobile Offline: add event queue entry</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var adder = new AddValueToCsvProperty(); adder.add('event.limited.queues', 'mobile_offline_payload_gen_queue'); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-04-02 02:36:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a0f6f16353330010c722ddeeff7b12f8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Mobile Offline: add event queue entry</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="SG Offline support" source="com.glide.sg.offline">5cfdf0e03c75311068bcf327dfe37f1f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a0f6f16353330010c722ddeeff7b12f8</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-04-02 02:36:12</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Mobile Offline: add event queue entry
